P0=ISend(0,123,1842650400);Recv(0,123);ISend(0,123,1842978112);Recv(0,123);ISend(1,123,1843134336);Recv(1,123);ISend(1,123,1843605376);Recv(*,*);Wait(1842650400);Wait(1842978112);Wait(1843134336);Recv(*,567);ISend(1,234,1844377024);Recv(1,123);Recv(1,123);Barrier;
P1=ISend(1,123,1842685760);Recv(1,123);ISend(1,123,1842832000);Recv(1,123);ISend(0,123,1843290432);Recv(0,123);ISend(0,123,1843656256);Recv(*,*);Wait(1842685760);Wait(1842832000);Wait(1843290432);ISend(0,567,1844234368);Recv(0,234);ISend(0,123,1844532352);ISend(0,123,1844538304);Barrier;
